archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Issue Customer Problem Management Summaries
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process issues specialized summaries of the efficiency and effectiveness of the overall Customer Problem resolution process. These specialized summaries could be specific reports required by specific audiences. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory Issue specialized summaries of the efficiency and effectiveness of the overall S/P problem resolution process. These specialized summaries could be specific reports required by specific audiences.
